评论详情: Perfect cargo pants for thin tall girlies! Updated: different colors are not as long unfortunately:(

I wear these pants for work in construction environments. Personally, I love them. I will say that the sizing can be.....inconsistent. I have a couple pairs that are just slightly too small around the waist. I just bought a button extender to fix the issue.  The pants are heavy, thick, and will take longer in the drier if you have a lot of them drying at once.  The stitching isn't super amazing, there are definitely some threads hanging about where the pockets are, but I just cut them off and haven't had any issues.
Im 5'9 145 And I got a Small, They fit exactly as I hoped, Great length love them!

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for
评论详情: Love these,true to size! No stretch at all
The material sucks. After one wear between the legs has the little balls of lint like I had it for a long time.

Not really for big girls. I tried my best to get into them but its really tight around my thigh area to the point i cant even walk in them. The material is very thick and Id say theyre washable just be ware if youre on the bigger side to go up a size or two if not they will be uncomfortable

Size: I’m 5’7.5”, inseam 30”, waist 26”, hips 37”, 135 lbs. Size S fit me perfectly, especially the length! The waist is a little too loose to be super high waisted the way I like, so I added a belt. Without the belt they sit about 1 inch lower than what you see in my pics.  Comfort/fabric: Fabric is 95% cotton, it’s veryy comfy and breathable. It’s light fabric, so they are not suited for super cold weather - you could layer leggings under them if needed. They are not see through at all. Did not shrink after washing and machine drying. The buttons feel a little cheap but tbh if they fall off I’ll just replace them.  Style: Even cuter than I thought! The pockets don’t have buttons or zippers so you probably won’t want to put valuable things in them. The ankle ties aren’t drawstrings, but you can still tie them tight - it’ll just tie some of the fabric itself if that makes sense.  Overall I’m sooo so pleasantly surprised with these pants!! I’ve been looking for good cargos everywhere and finally found them :’) I highly recommend!
My daughter loves these cargo, but we ordered black and they sent us brown!! Very disappointing! :(
Ran way too small. Size up if your going to order

I bought these for a Halloween costume, and I’m happy with them! They’re definitely not high rise, but I bought them bc of the review photos that seemed to show them as low rise. If you get your exact size, keep in mind you won’t be able to pull them down to be super low rise like I had hoped. But they’re good quality and I would wear them on a normal day. I’d recommend them for everyday outfits!

I really liked the baggy look at the bottom, it’s exactly what I was going for. They remind me of Kim Possible pants.

Honestly very cute, and the material felt nice but the fit made no sense. The waist was much smaller than the rest of the pants meaning it wouldn’t zip. Sizing up wouldnt have solved it since you would have to go up to fit your waist. Overall inconsistent.

We just got these today. My autistic daughter is obsessed with them. They have so many pockets. She says that they're comfortable, and she is very particular about how things feel. This pair of cargo pants look good, but not elasticity, my weigh is 155 pounds and I got a large one, and it’s very big it doesn’t fit me, if you weigh around 155-165 pounds I would recommend you to buy a Medium size. The quality is good, it values the money,

Now, these are super cute, but they don’t stretch. I was able to put them on and pull them all the way up but I could not button them. I wish the waist was elastic. The fabric is great and they are not thin  like some other ones are. I would buy them again but there is no other size to purchase.

I am tall, 6'0" about 160lbs. I got a medium and it was a tad small, but I can deal with it. I should have ordered a size up. The inseam of these are 30"... so definitely not for tall people. The hem can be let out for another inch or so. Haven't done it yet so I don't know it you lose the strings or not. Either way, I don't care for the strings, they are longer than expected and I am a walking trip hazard. I haven't washed it yet, so don't know if it shrinks. But I will be sticking to a low heat just in case because if it gets any smaller, I wont be able to wear it. No stretch to the fabric so I hope the person wearing it wont be too curvy; wouldn't be ideal. The zipper is kinda cheap, I am definitely afraid my fupa will take over and destroy it. The fabric is almost like a jean material but a bit softer. The fabric is pretty thick. It looks good on. Hugs the bottom nicely and the pockets make it look decent (for all you "flat tires" out there like me, thimbs up). On me the top of the pant sits just at my belly button.  My measurements: Waist above button 32" Belly below button: 37" Hips: 38" Largest part of bottom: 41" Preferable inseam: 32-33"

评论概述: Tan doesn’t look like the photo!
评论详情: The tan doesn’t look like the material in the photo at all. It’s more like a stiff dickies or carhartt non stretch stiff material. And you can not tighten the bottom of the pants like shown in the photo either. The strings are there but do not tighten the pants at all!

The material is a soft but sturdy cotton distressed perfectly. I’m glad I got the large because they are constructed long and I’m 5.6 - 130 lbs so they gather perfectly at my ankles and still crimp at the leg-I like that crunched look. Usually I tend to want to go XL for the casual effortless look but they would have been way too big. I’m going to wash before wearing so they’ll have an even softer denim feel. Really happy with this purchase.

评论概述: Just like everyone else said, it’s small.
评论详情: Currently I’m in between sizes. I’m sometimes a medium and sometimes a large. 5’4”, 165-170Ibs. So I figured I could go with large since everyone said these were small in the waist area. Nope, still too small. I would have needed an XL but then they would have been too big. These pants actually fit my waist perfectly! My problem was more so in my mid section/hips, it was slightly too small or tight or something and it made it pull in the crotch area. So I’m returning them. If I got a XL, it would probably fit my hip area better but it would be way too big on my waist. I do like the material and the overall fit/style. But unfortunately these won’t work with my body.

I was extremely worried when purchasing these based on other reviews! However, they are one of my favorite pair of pants. One thing I dislike is the strings at the bottom of the pants, they don't tighten very well. They seem to be there for decoration rather than for practical use. Other than that, they're extremely flattering. I am 5'7" and the medium size fit perfectly. If you are lower body heavy, size up!

Edit:: I went ahead and bought the black and the light green. The light green's waist was so tight. No comparison to the other pairs. The black pair I bought in this brand were a little tighter than the first pair I bought but were doable. I'll be returning the light green, but I'm not sure if I should size up or try another large in thinking this was a manufacturing glitch. I'm going to return the black one's also. I did the sit down test. They bulged upwards and the zipper is hard to move up. I guess I'll be trying out the XL in these two.EDIT: Couldn't purchase, they were out of the Xl. I am so happy with this purchase. I will be getting a few more. I bought the Khaki. They fit in all the right places, and they don't make me look like a stuffed sausage by any means.  I'm almost 5'5 and 160lbs. I bought a large. The feel of the fabric is very nice. They're soft feeling. I don't have large hips or much of a butt. I lost a lot of weight due to a hyperthyroid. I still have wiggle room. I did tuck the laces in at the bottoms to see how that would look. A+. They really look good any way you wear them at the bottom. I have looked at so many pairs of cargo pants for over a month, and I'm so glad I chose these. They go great with the shoes I bought on Amazon. I think a platform gym shoe is a great shoe to wear with these pants.

评论概述: Fashion Win! High Waist Baggy Cargo Jeans - Pure Style Delight!
评论详情: I got my hands on these High Waist Baggy Cargo Jeans, and I am head over heels in love with them! If you're on the hunt for the perfect blend of comfort and style, look no further.  First and foremost, the design is a total fashion win. The high waist adds a trendy touch, and the baggy cargo style is not only comfortable but incredibly stylish. These jeans strike the perfect balance between casual and chic, making them a versatile addition to any wardrobe.  The fit is fantastic. The high waist is not only on-trend but also flattering, accentuating the waistline in all the right ways. The baggy fit provides a relaxed feel without sacrificing the overall silhouette, and the cargo pockets add a cool and functional element to the design.  I can't get enough of the quality. The denim feels sturdy and durable, and the attention to detail in the stitching is evident. Despite the baggy fit, the jeans maintain a structured look that doesn't compromise on style.  I also appreciate the versatility of these jeans. They can be dressed up with a chic blouse and heels or rocked casually with sneakers and a tee. The possibilities are endless, and that's what makes them such a wardrobe staple.  If you're in the market for cute and stylish jeans that tick all the boxes, these High Waist Baggy Cargo Jeans are a must-have. I'm absolutely smitten with mine and have already received numerous compliments. Five stars for making comfort and style effortlessly chic!
